verbose_text: It has also been reported that E. acervulina MIC3 (EaMIC3) and E. mitis (EmMIC3) are expressed in the sporozoite and merozoite stages, localized at the parasite apex, and could significantly protect chickens from E. acervulina infection [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: EaMIC3) and E. mitis (EmMIC3) are expressed
